whyStudyInUk.title: World-Renowned Universities
whyStudyInUk.description: The UK is home to top universities like Oxford, Cambridge, and Imperial College London. UK degrees are globally recognized and highly valued by employers.

whyStudyInUk.title: Shorter Course Duration
whyStudyInUk.description: Most undergraduate courses are 3 years and masterâ€™s programs are just 1 year, saving both time and money compared to other countries.

whyStudyInUk.title: Post-Study Work Opportunities
whyStudyInUk.description: The Graduate Route Visa allows international students to stay and work in the UK for 2 years (3 years for PhD graduates) after completing their studies.

whyStudyInUk.title: Multicultural Environment
whyStudyInUk.description: Students from over 180+ countries study in the UK, making it a culturally diverse and welcoming place to live and learn.

whyStudyInUk.title: Work While Studying
whyStudyInUk.description: International students can work up to 20 hours per week during term time and full-time during holidays to support living expenses and gain experience.

whyStudyInUk.title: High-Quality Education System
whyStudyInUk.description: UK education focuses on practical learning, critical thinking, and research-based study, preparing students for real-world challenges.
